review: Consulted  Dr. Jayakrishnan Pillai  for a complex  tibia plateau fracture  treatment and surgery .Initially reached out to him for a second opinion and went ahead with the surgery as I found the doctor to be very ************* ,competent  and skilled. . He patiently answered all my questions and gave me confidence  to go ahead with the treatment . He is very approachable, humble and kind despite being so qualified  and experienced . He  is a top notch  orthopedist and. surgeon  and I would highly recommend him for any ortho related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor was fantastic.He is a great human being as he not only addressed my issue but since I met with an accident and had wounds and could not find a general physician the doctor referred me to a hospital which gave me a tetanus shot for my wounds.This is my 3rd visit to the doctor and as usual he always exceeds expectations.
The front office lady executive was fantastic in rescheduling my appointment and getting me to meet the doctor quickly.
Kudos to Dr.Pillai and his team.
I would definitely refer Dr.JP to everyone.

Overall, I am very satisfied with the way he goes about seeing a patient and would highly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review:
I met Dr Pillai at Apollo Spectra. He was very friendly and approachable. He was also very gentle. I was in severe pain and fainted in his office and he caught me before I fell off the stool and helped me recover quickly by placing me on the floor to get the blood flow to my head and kept giving me instructions to check my response. 
He immediately got me an appointment with the GP to check my sugar and BP. He recommended a very nice clean diagnostic centre in Indranagar, Tenet Diagnostic near Indranagar club. He did an online consultation with me the same evening after getting the reports. The good thing is he does not give too many medicines, he kept telling me not to take extra medication when I was asking for more. Most importantly he gave an antacid with the medication which many Doctors forget to give. He is very patient and responsive. I highly recommend him.
